name: The Situation - 2021
description:
"The Situation", by Geraldo Anhaia Mello, is a video performance from 1978. Graduated from the School of Visual Arts in New York, Mello was one of the artists who stood out in the 1970s with the arrival of video art in Brazil.

In a provocative performance, the artist proposes to repeat the same phrase while drinking 2 liters of cachaça.
